name: Marshwood Springs Visual Novel (Beta Test)
description:
This is the official beta version of the upcoming Marshwood Springs Visual Novel, a visual novel adaptation and retelling of the events of Season One of The Marshwood Springs Oddities Society webseries (which can be found here).

I'd absolutely love if you played through this and gave some feedback on the project, either here in the comments of this project or in my Discord.

Thank you so much for your time! I hope to get this out by the end of the year, assuming Season One of the webseries has concluded by the end of the year.
